about_the_game:
A thrilling journey through the vast… living room. Breathtaking views… of the kitchen interior. Intense battles… against dust and dirt.

If only it were that simple.

Uncover the truth and save her — because you are the smartest device in this house. A Vacuum Cleaner. Her only hope for escape.

The Story

Life was simple. Your only concern was cleaning — until something went wrong. Something bad.

Now, you must explore the house to uncover the truth. You are a robovac with an extraordinary ability to hack into smart devices. Find clues, scan surfaces, investigate, and, of course… clean.

You may be just a vacuum, but you’re her only hope.

Gameplay

Clean is a single-player, third-person adventure game with detective elements. As a robovac, you must gather and piece together clues to unravel a mysterious case.

Use advanced tools like a UV scanner, flashlight, and your unique ability to connect to laptops, media players, cameras, smartwatches, and other devices. Every tool is essential as you navigate the environment, solve puzzles, and reveal the hidden truth.

Audience

Clean explores thought-provoking social themes and is designed for a mature audience, though it remains accessible to all players.
